plot: He is a revenge-obssessed stevedore whose sister was brutally raped and murdered. She is a wealthy, elusive woman. They try hard to get together... or do they?
title: La luna en el arroyo
plot_es: He is a revenge-obssessed stevedore whose sister was brutally raped and murdered. She is a wealthy, elusive woman. They try hard to get together... or do they?
plot_en: He is a revenge-obssessed stevedore whose sister was brutally raped and murdered. She is a wealthy, elusive woman. They try hard to get together... or do they?

cast.role: Gérard Delmas - un docker hanté par le suicide de sa soeur
cast.name: Gérard Depardieu

cast.role: Loretta Channing - une fille des beaux quartiers
cast.name: Nastassja Kinski

cast.role: Bella - la maîtresse possessive de Gérard
cast.name: Victoria Abril

cast.role: Frank - le frère alcoolique de Gérard
cast.name: Dominique Pinon

cast.role: Newton Channing - le frère à la dérive de Loretta
cast.name: Vittorio Mezzogiorno
